[Rechargeable Harfoowo Wireless Mouse] Built-in durable 450mAh lithium rechargeable battery can last up to 500 hours after fully charged, and standby time is super long with auto sleep and wake mode. Easily recharged through the included USB cable, no need to change the battery

【Wireless Mouse·1600 DPI】It can move freely within a range of up to 10 m through 2.4 GHz wireless transmission.You can use it easily without interference from cables, and enjoy more freedom than I thought.Adjustable with three levels precision (800/1200/1600 DPI), which can be tracked more precisely and correctly, the speed of the mouse can be controlled more freely and the operation can be more precise.

【Skin-Friendly for Comfort & Mute Click】Silent click Mouse with classic design with anti-fingerprint finish offers your hand maximum support and comfort. The sturdy anti-slip rubber scroll wheel ensures that your hand will not slip when scrolling.Quiet click sound when pressing buttons, which let you not worry about the mouse sound can disturbing others, especially at home or office, when other members having rest, you can focused on your work without worry.

This wireless mouse plug and play, just two steps, is suitable for any desktop computer and laptop. The connection is 100% stable. It does not need to connect to the computer via Bluetooth, nor does it need to worry about Bluetooth disconnection and complex Bluetooth connection like a Bluetooth mouse
body.description: ✅ This Harfoowo wireless mouse plug and play, just two steps, is suitable for any desktop computer and laptop. The connection is 100% stable. It does not need to connect to the computer via Bluetooth, nor does it need to worry about Bluetooth disconnection and complex Bluetooth connection like a Bluetooth mousePacking list: instruction *1, Rechargeable Wireless Mouse *1, USB wireless receiver *1 (taken out from the bottom of the mouse), type C receiver *1 (taken out from the bottom of the mouse), USB charging cable *1, packing carton *1. ✅ How do I use this wireless mouse on my laptop?1: Remove the USB receiver or Type C receiver at the bottom of the mouse (remove the receiver suitable for your computer/laptop port) and plug the receiver into the port of your computer /laptop2: Turn on the mouse switch, move the mouse or press the left and right mouse buttons, and the mouse will start working on your computer desktop，Plug and play, only need 2 steps to use. 🔋How do I charge this mouse？br>🔋When the pointer of your mouse does not move or cannot be used, or suddenly disconnects continuously in use, you need to charge it for about 3 hours. Please use the USB port of your computer to charge it, or use an adapter with an output of no more than 5v to charge it🔋This is a rechargeable mouse. It doesn't require you to buy any other batteries. It already has a built-in lithium battery. It can be charged like a mobile phone. There is a USB charging line in the box

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 8,093 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouse works well and seems to be a great value. I've been using it regularly for a few weeks and haven't even had to recharge it yet! I love that it has a USB charger, and that the USB connector for your laptop nests inside the belly of the mouse. Good design & functional product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small mouse for laptop
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality and product, easy to install, work very well, great value for this price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT WIRELESS MOUSE
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mouse at $12.99 for my Mac Air as I didn't want to pay the price of a mac Mouse at $79.99. What I liked about it was that it had a USB-C adapter for a Mac as well as a USB adapter for an HP! Both fit neatly in the mouse. It's sleek design in a variety of colors was a no brainer, and I thoroughly enjoy this purchase!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute, light, lasted 1 year 2 mos
reviews.reviewText: The price and the color of this mouse (a cute rose pink) was right so I gave it a try. It worked great, the charge lasted a long time as long as I remembered to turn it off when I wasn’t using it, and it was nice and light. It’s not exactly an ergonomic design but I didn’t care much about that. Unfortunately, the clicking function has suddenly died after 1 year and 2 mos of near daily use, though the scrolling wheel still works and the mouse can still move the cursor. Oh well, for the price point I didn’t really expect it to live longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Value for Money - A High-Quality Wireless Mouse!
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't be happier with my purchase. Not only did I snag this gem at an incredible price, but it also surpassed my expectations in terms of quality, ease of installation, and aesthetics.One of the first things that caught my eye about this wireless mouse is its sleek and modern design.When it comes to a wireless mouse, performance is key, and this wireless mouse doesn't disappoint. It offers smooth and precise tracking, making it a joy to use for work or play. The cursor response is lightning-fast, essential for tasks requiring precision. Whether you're working on spreadsheets or engaging in some intense gaming, this mouse handles it all effortlessly.I couldn't be happier with my purchase, and I'm confident you'll feel the same way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered because I got a new computer that requires CPort compatibility. This was easy to set up and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse for wife
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact it doesn’t need batteries making it lighter. My wife said it fits her hand much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, but not durable
reviews.reviewText: Everyone is right in that it is beautiful and sleek and fits in your hand well. I also like that the click function is soft and does not irritate my finger as much as most standard computer mouses. I've only had it nine months though and don't use it on a daily basis, but it's no longer working. The red light at the bottom that senses movement of the mouse does it stay on as if it is not charged.
Quedo perfecto para mi mcbook se siente suave y jala al 100%.
Muy ligero y práctico, se conecta fácilmente tanto a Mac como otras laptops. 100% recomendado
It works well and vey light. It is a good mouse.
